CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services

Class CompanyServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CompanyServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyService

    @Service
public class CompanyServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyService

    Company Service Implementation

    This Class Functions as a Service implementation which implements CompanyService.class - Interface that represent All the Functions Available for a User from type - Company.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCoupon(long companyId, Coupon coupon)
      Create Coupon A method that receives a coupon validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) sets its company and uses the CouponRepository.Class to save it in the date base .
      Company getCompany(long companyId)
      Get Company A method that receives a companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CompanyRepository.class to return an object of the company specified from the data base .
      java.util.List<Coupon> getCompanyCoupons(long companyId)
      Get Company Coupons A method that receives a companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CompanyRepository.class to return a list of the company specified Coupons from the data base .
      java.util.List<Coupon> getCompanyCouponsByDate(long companyId, java.sql.Date date)
      Get Company Coupons By Date A method that receives a companyId ,certain date -validates it.
      java.util.List<Coupon> getCompanyCouponsByPrice(long companyId, double price)
      Get Company Coupons By Price A method that receives a companyId ,certain price -validates it.
      java.util.List<Coupon> getCompanyCouponsByType(long companyId, CouponType couponType)
      Get Company Coupons By Type A method that receives a companyId ,certain coupon Type -validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CompanyRepository.class to return a list of the company specified by coupon type Coupons from the data base .
      Company login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String email, ClientType clientType)
      Company Login A method that receives company Login Parameters -validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CompanyRepository.class to validate the company details if the validation process was successful -return the object of the company, if not - Login Exception.
      void removeCoupon(long companyId, long couponId)
      Remove Coupon A method that receives a couponId and companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CustomerRepository.class to remove the coupon from the lists of purchased coupons by the customers in the data base.
      void updateCoupon(long companyId, long couponId, java.sql.Date endDate, java.lang.Double price)
      Update Coupon A method that receives a couponId,companyId,EndDate,Price validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
      and uses the CouponRepository.class to update the coupon with the received new parameters (Expiration date, Price) in the data base.

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        public void createCoupon(long companyId,
                         Coupon coupon)
                  throws CouponSystemException,
                         InvalidParamException,
                         UnFoundExecption

        Create Coupon

        A method that receives a coupon validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) sets its company and uses the CouponRepository.Class to save it in the date base .
        Specified by:
        createCoupon in interface CompanyService
        Parameters:
        coupon - - coupon Entity (coupon)
        companyId - - company ID (long)
        Throws:
        InvalidParamException - - in case the coupon expiration date provided is not valid.
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is Already Coupon with same title in the Data Base.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a running time Exception has been thrown/ Unexpected Error has been occurred by the JPA.

      • removeCoupon

        public void removeCoupon(long companyId,
                         long couponId)
                  throws CouponSystemException,
                         UnFoundExecption

        Remove Coupon

        A method that receives a couponId and companyId validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CustomerRepository.class to remove the coupon from the lists of purchased coupons by the customers in the data base.
        also uses the CouponRepository.Class to remove the coupon itself in the date base as well as.
        Specified by:
        removeCoupon in interface CompanyService
        Parameters:
        couponId - - couponId (long)
        companyId - - company ID (long)
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is no Coupon with those Id's in the Data Base.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a running time Exception has been thrown/ Unexpected Error has been occurred by the JPA.

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(long companyId,
                         long couponId,
                         java.sql.Date endDate,
                         java.lang.Double price)
                  throws CouponSystemException,
                         UnFoundExecption

        Update Coupon

        A method that receives a couponId,companyId,EndDate,Price validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
        and uses the CouponRepository.class to update the coupon with the received new parameters (Expiration date, Price) in the data base.
        Specified by:
        updateCoupon in interface CompanyService
        Parameters:
        couponId - - couponId (long)
        companyId - - company ID (long)
        endDate - - endDate (Date)
        price - - price (Double)
        Throws:
        UnFoundExecption - - in case there is no Coupon with that matches with the giving Id's in the Data Base.
        CouponSystemException - - in case a running time Exception has been thrown/ Unexpected Error has been occurred by the JPA.

      • login

        public Company login(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String email,
                     ClientType clientType)
              throws LoginExcecption

        Company Login

        A method that receives company Login Parameters -validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library) and uses the CompanyRepository.class to validate the company details if the validation process was successful -return the object of the company, if not - Login Exception.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CompanyService
        Parameters:
        name - - name (String)
        password - - password (String)
        email - - email (String)
        clientType - - clientType (ClientType.enum)
        Returns:
        Company - company
        Throws:
        LoginExcecption - - in case there is no Company found that matches with the giving Id's in the Data Base,Login Failed.
